post:
As part of BlueVM's labor day special we are offering a huge discount on our KVM VPS line. Limited stock is available on these VPS so please grab them while they're hot. We've also done a large overhaul on our OS lists...

**KVM01 - California - $15 / Year!**
128 MB of RAM
1 CPU's (@2.5 Ghz+ Each)
1 IP Address
10 GB of Storage
200 GB of Bandwidth
Order Link: https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=78

**KVM02 - California - $25 / Year!**
256 MB of RAM
1 CPU's (@2.5 Ghz+ Each)
1 IP Address
15 GB of Storage
600 GB of Bandwidth
Order Link: https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=79

**KVM03 - California - $40 / Year!**
512 MB of RAM
2 CPU's (@2.5 Ghz+ Each)
1 IP Address
25 GB of Storage
1 TB of Bandwidth
Order Link: https://www.bluevm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=80

**Your choice of any of the following operating systems:**

NetBSD 5.1.2
FreeBSD 8.3
Gentoo 12.1
Fedora 17
CentOS 6.3
CentOS 5.8
OpenBSD 5.1
Debian 6
LinuxMint 13 KDE
LinuxMint 13 XFCE
OpenSUSE 12.1
Slackware 12.1
Ubuntu 11.04
Ubuntu 12.04
Ubuntu 10.04.4 LTS
Ubuntu 10.04.4 LTS

Don't see the OS or version you would like? Simply open a ticket with us with a link to the ISO and we'll make it available within 24 hours... If it is a licensed OS (such as windows) you will need to provide your own key when you install the OS.

Test IP: 199.116.113.178 or 199.229.255.1
